descriptor.name: AXE Ultra Smooth After Shave Balm, 100 g
descriptor.short_desc: About this product The Worlds 1 Male Deodorant Axe brings you the all new Axe shave range Ignoring your super important post shave care Not anymore The all new Axe Ultrasmooth Aftershave Balm
descriptor.long_desc: About this product The Worlds 1 Male Deodorant Axe brings you the all new Axe shave range Ignoring your super important post shave care Not anymore The all new Axe Ultrasmooth Aftershave Balm is here to bring about your aftershave calm Infused with Glycerine and Antioxidants this unique formulation moisturizes your skin giving it the muchneeded hydration after every shave Get in on the secrets of a great shave regime for that ohsosmooth feeling that helps you get closer Not sure on how to use after shave balm Its easy Just rinse your face thoroughly after shaving pat down with a towel to dry dispense the required amount of aftershave balm on to your palm and apply evenly on your face Massaging your face in circular motions while applying the balm may help the balm seep into your skin better for that ultraslick ultrasmooth feeling The Axe Ultrasmooth After Shave Balm helps alleviate razor burns and makes your skin feel so much better postshave So are you ready to up your shave game Quick Tip top up your Axe Ultrasmooth Shaving Balm with the all new Axe Ultrasmooth Shaving Foam and build the ultimate shave regime for the best results Protects skin from irritation due to razor burns and cuts Spreads easily on application Leaves the skin feeling smooth and moisturized post shave Contains hydrating glycerine to keep your skin moisturized Contains antioxidants Use post each shave for best results Storage Direction eg Condition Store in a cool amp dark place
